titleStmt.title: Sermons vpon a part of the first chap. of the Gospell of S. Iohn. Preached by Antony Wotton, in the parish church of Alhallowes Barking in London, and now by him published
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Samuell Macham, and are to be sould at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: A² B-2G 2H⁴ 2I² (-2I2).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head
